ANALYSIS.NAME: QC_IONENBALANS
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Berekening van de ionenbalans uit de verschillende analysetechnieken

CALCULATION.SOURCE_CODE:
'Calculate Equivalent value IF (IsEMpty(ICkationen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICkationen * 0.0435) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0435) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
Return

'Calculate Equivalent value IF (IsEMpty(ICkationen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICkationen * 0.0256) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0256) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
Return

'Calculate Equivalent value
IF (IsEMpty(ICkationen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICkationen * 0.0823) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0823) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
Return

'Calculate Equivalent value IF (IsEMpty(ICkationen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICkationen * 0.0499) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0499) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value IF (IsEMpty(ICkationen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICkationen * 0.0554) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAanionen * 0.0554) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value
IF (IsEMpty(pHTit) = false) THEN power = -1 * pHTit icResult = 1000 * (10 ^ power) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(pHMan) = false) THEN power = -1 * pHMan icResult = 1000 * (10 ^ power) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value
IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0358) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMet * 0.0358) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0741) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMet * 0.0741) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value
IF (IsEMpty(ICPMinMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMinMet * 0.0364) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ICPMet) = false) THEN icResult = (ICPMet * 0.0364) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate total Kationen IF (IsEmpty(NA)) THEN NA = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(K)) THEN K = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(MG)) THEN MG = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(CA)) THEN CA = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(NH4)) THEN NH4 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(PH)) THEN PH = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(FE)) THEN FE = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(AL)) THEN AL = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(MN)) THEN MN = 0 ENDIF
icResult = NA + K + MG + CA + NH4 + PH + FE + AL + MN
return icResult

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen
IF (IsEMpty(ICanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICanionen * 0.0282) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAanionen * 0.0282) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen IF (IsEMpty(ICanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICanionen * 0.0217) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAanionen * 0.0217) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen IF (IsEMpty(ICanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICanionen * 0.0161) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAanionen * 0.0161) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen
IF (IsEMpty(ICanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICanionen * 0.0208) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAanionen * 0.0208) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen
IF (IsEMpty(ICanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (ICanionen * 0.0316) RETURN icResult ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAanionen) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAanionen * 0.0316) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen
IF (IsEMpty(ALKtep) = false) THEN if (ALKtep > 0) then icResult = (ALKtep / 1000) RETURN icResult else icResult = 0 return icResult endif ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ALKoep) = false) THEN if (ALKoep > 0) then icResult = (ALKoep / 61) RETURN icResult else icResult = 0 return icResult endif
ELSE IF (IsEMpty(CFAHCO3) = false) THEN icResult = (CFAHCO3 / 61) RETURN icResult ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen
IF (IsEMpty(ALKtep) = false) THEN icResult = 0 return icResult
ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ALKoep) = false) THEN if (ALKoep > 0) then icResult = (ALKoep / 30) RETURN icResult else icResult = 0 return icResult endif
ELSE ENDIF ENDIF
return

'Calculate Equivalent value Anionen
IF (IsEMpty(ALKtep) = false) THEN icResult = 0 return icResult
ELSE IF (IsEMpty(ALKoep) = false) THEN if (ALKoep > 0) then icResult = (ALKoep / 60) RETURN icResult else icResult = 0 return icResult endif
ELSE ENDIF ENDIF
return
'code versie 2
'IF (IsEMpty(ALKoep)) then ' return 'else ' if (ALKoep > 0) then ' lcResult = (ALKoep / 18) ' RETURN lcResult ' else ' return ' endif 'ENDIF

'Calculate Equivalent value
if (isEmpty(DOC) and isEmpty(NPOC)) then icResult = 0 RETURN icResult endif
IF (NotEMpty(DOC)) THEN Waarde = DOC ELSE IF (NotEMpty(NPOC)) THEN Waarde = NPOC ENDIF ENDIF
Heq = (HH / 1000) Base = 10 pHvalue = -1 * LogBase(Base, Heq) pka = (0.96 + (0.9 * pHvalue)) - (0.039 * (pHvalue ^ 2)) powerpka = -1 * pka ka = (10 ^ 3) * (10 ^ powerpka)
icResult = 0.0055 * Waarde * (ka / (ka + HH))
return icResult

'Calculate total Anionen IF (IsEmpty(CL)) THEN CL = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(NO2)) THEN NO2 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(NO3)) THEN NO3 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(SO4)) THEN SO4 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(PO4)) THEN PO4 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(HCO3)) THEN HCO3 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(CO3)) THEN CO3 = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(OH)) THEN OH = 0 ENDIF IF (IsEmpty(DOC)) THEN DOC = 0 ENDIF
icResult = CL + NO2 + NO3 + SO4 + PO4 + HCO3 + CO3 + OH + DOC
return icResult

'Calculate Absolut difference
icResult = SomKationen - SomAnionen icResult = ABS(icResult)
return icResult

SomIonen = SomKationen + SomAnionen
if (SomIonen = 0) then RETURN endif
lcResult = (VerschilABS / SomIonen) * 100
RETURN lcResult
